app.max_user_query_length.description: Maximum character length for user queries before disabling direct search. Longer queries will use LLM-generated questions only.
app.max_user_query_length.name: Max User Query Length

search.favorites.description: List of favorite search engine IDs that appear at the top of the dropdown. Edit as JSON array, e.g. ["arxiv", "brave"]
search.favorites.name: Search Favorites
